TopicTitle: I'd like to apologise to the forums

Articles.Content:
Not to any person particularly, but to the pile of code i am repeatedly abusing ans i refresh the page every 15 minutes to see if the new patch is out yet. So again i do apologies for any discomfort this may have cause you oh great pile o forum code. I do hope that you can forgive me. now if you'll excuse me....

(F5)

(F5)

(F5)

(F5)

Would you mind switching to the @KerbalSpaceP Twitter feed? You don't need an account to view it, it automatically refreshes itself so you won't break your F5 key, and I'm sure the Twitter servers are better equiped to handle this kind of stress.
I think he wants to be up to date.

Do you have KSP on steam? If so that will automatically tell you (so long as you are subscribed to the KSP community hub) when it is released. Save your F5 key some stress, it's not gonna be out today anyway...

Do you have KSP on steam? If so that will automatically tell you (so long as you are subscribed to the KSP community hub) when it is released. Save your F5 key some stress, it's not gonna be out today anyway...

i do and i am... however im still anxious.

and what do you mean it wont be out today is that confirmed somewhere?

i do and i am... however im still anxious.

and what do you mean it wont be out today is that confirmed somewhere?

that was confirmed yesterday about yesterday. Nothing said abut today
Apology accepted. Now that that's settled, please continue looking forward to the 24 release in the several appropriate threads in General Discussion.
